name: homebase
description: Track daily workouts, meal plans, and weight changes

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:server
scripts.dev: npm run build:all && (start /B npm run server && npm run start)
scripts.build:pages: npm run build && rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs && cp index.html styles.css docs/ && cp -r dist docs/ && touch docs/.nojekyll
